> "Pick them... they need repairs"said motioned to the decepticons and
> predacons there "If some of the those... creatures appears open fire to
> eliminate them"

Iguanus gave Hydras a strange look, "No orders to help Cyclonus?" he
smiled, "Fine by me!" he said as he stood up and began walking towards
the battle!

Inferno on the other hand didn't even ask any questions, he
immidiately lept up and began running running toward the battle and
the fallen Predacons and Decepticons.

Fractyl crawled up next to Hydras trying to keep out of sight of the
battle, "Shouldn't we have warned cyclonus first?"

*   *   *   *

Cyclonus continued to fight the creature, in his damaged state the
creature was proving to be a match for him. As Inferno and Iguanus
apprached Cyclonus turned for a moment to see what or who it was that
was approaching from his rear. Although Cyclonus' lapse was momentary
it was enough and the creature used it to get in under his defences
and send him sailing back against the wall, a long gash running down
his chest.

The creature turned its insect gaze on Inferno and Iguanus as it
raised its claws and smiled, "The horde greets you Predacons." the
creature said, "More to feed our armies!" It's auto cannons orienting
on them . . .

(TAG)

Preston
